item.title: Install php-Mongo driver on Windows XAMPP
item.description: Honestly im Linux/unix user, but in this case , i’ll make my MAC turn into jendela or fvcking windows I will configure MongoDB with PHP xampp. It is very easy to do. Oke let’s install latest XAMPP, cause i am using XAMPP , here we go !! 1 Installing MongoDB 2 Download MongoDB here 3 Extract the archive , you will see all version of mongo.dll (read step 6) Check your Php version by going to http://localhost/phpinfo.
